annotation.value: Primary Flow:  Initiate a VC Presentation Request for Credential Validation

sktemplate.name: VerifyPolling

annotation.value: To Configure: Define the requested credential type in the 'Presentation Request Settings' node.  The credential type is typically the credential name, e.g. VerifiedEmployee.

fields.displayName: Request message to display on the credential wallet, if supported.
Optional. If not defined, all keys are returned.  Comma-delimited list of requested credential keys if specific keys from the credential are desired.
Type of credential to verify. Must be the name of a PingOne credential type issued by the credential issuer.
